Chiquita's Journal

I was first introduced to the Devops facet of engineering during my Internship at Edu.Chat. This was the time when I was simultaneously developing and testing using Travis CI. While working on unit tests I understood the real meaning of continuous integration tool and how it shapes the Software Development cycle.


I decided to take up the Devops course to explore the testing phase of software development and build a strong understanding of various tools that can be used in the software development life cycle and also to understand which tools to use in which situation

Simple Devops Introduction
